tool.name: Land Surface Temperature
tool.description: Temperature estimation at each grid point as a function of temperature, temperature lapse rate and elevation for a reference station. Further optional input is the Leaf Area Index (LAI) and the short-wave radiation ratio, which relates the irradiance including terrain effects to that calculated for a flat, horizontal plane. See Wilson & Gallant (2000) for more details.

param.name: SWR
param.label: Short Wave Radiation Ratio
param.help: The ratio of daily total short-wave irradiance on sloping sites compared to horizontal sites.

param.name: T_REFERENCE
param.label: Temperature
param.help: Temperature at reference station in degree Celsius.

param.name: T_GRADIENT
param.label: Temperature Lapse Rate
param.help: Vertical temperature gradient in degree Celsius per 100 meter.
